revised_title: Discovery and Analysis of the Georgian Planet and Its Satellites
tldr: In this paper, William Herschel discusses the discovery and analysis of the Georgian Planet and its two satellites. He provides details on the periodical times of these satellites, their orbits, and the methods used to determine their positions. Additionally, Herschel calculates the distance, density, and gravitational force on the surface of the Georgian Planet, comparing it to the Earth.
